on reading compounds: 戸【コ】counter for houses, households, apartments, etc.
下戸【ゲコ】someone who can't drink, non-drinker, temperate man
kun reading compounds: 戸【と】door (esp. Japanese-style), shutter, window shutter, entrance (to a home), narrows
戸惑い【とまどい】being at sea, losing one's bearings, confusion, wonderment

鳴門【なると】strait with a roaring tidal ebb and flow, whirlpool, maelstrom, kamaboko with a spiral whirlpool-like pattern, cooking technique where ingredients are cut in a spiral pattern, Naruto, city in NE Tokushima pref, Naruto Strait, Naruto wakame
